metadata.name: New Network ACL Entry Added
metadata.comment: Detects that network ACL entries have been added to a route table which could indicate that new attack vectors have been opened up in the AWS account.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(metadata.product.name) = lower('ec2.amazonaws.com') AND lower(metadata.event_code) = lower('createnetworkaclentry'))

output.summary: Detects that network ACL entries have been added to a route table which could indicate that new attack vectors have been opened up in the AWS account.

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate use of ACLs to enable customer and staff access from the public internet into a public VPC Reference: https://www.gorillastack.com/blog/real-time-events/important-aws-cloudtrail-security-events-tracking/
